body.name: 3-Pack Bottle Handles for Avent Natural Baby Bottles, Soft Silicone Bottle Holder for Baby Self Feeding, Teach Babies to Drink Independently, Easy Grip, BPA Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 13 mins
features: Baby Bottle Handles: Silicone bottle holders suitable for AVENT Natural Baby Bottle. You will get 3 pcs baby bottle holders, suitable for 4oz, 9oz and 11oz bottles, which will provide support for teach babies to drink independently.

Food-Safe Soft Silicone: Cadeya bottle holder for baby self feeding is made of food grade silicone, BPA free, no chemical additives. Soft silicone is safe, especially for teething babies. silicone handles are easy to wash, dishwasher and sterilizer safe.

Grows with Baby: As baby’s feeding progresses, introduce grippy silicone handles to help transition from bottle to sippy cup. Silicone handles help teach baby independent drinking skills while using the familiar baby bottle.

Thoughtful Design: Different from other baby bottle holders, Cadeya handles are smoother, curved design is ergonomic for baby natural grip. Encourage independent feeding faster and more effectively with 2 easy-grip handles. The right size and flexible silicone, make them will fit snugly onto the baby bottles, which prevent bottles from dropping and rolling.

Best Service: Cadeya is committed to focusing on baby growth and health, providing you with quality baby bottle accessories. If you have any questions about our baby bottle holder, please feel free to send us an e-mail. We will do our best to help you solve the problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft silicone handles.
reviews.reviewText: I really like these soft silicone bottle holders to help the baby learn how to hold the bottle for himself, you have a handle on both sides, so it makes it easier to grip with little hands and they are dishwasher safe too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Teaches baby how to hold bottle
reviews.reviewText: These work well with my philips avent baby bottles. They are really hard to get on but very sturdy once they are on. The handles are silicone and easy to grip for baby. Its nice to sort of teach baby how to hold bottle themselves since without the handles the bottle is too slippery and there is nothing to grab.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great. I have not used them too much yet but will be soon. It is great that it has two hands holding so that they child can comfortably grip the handles of the cup. It is also great that these can fit on multiple things to give me the flexibility of using different cups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars These are for the 4 oz not 8oz
reviews.reviewText: In accurate website description. I am disappointed because they are cute. Do not buy for the 8oz, perfect for 4oz. Pain to return, have to print the label

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Easy to put on the bottles. No problems with the item so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for bottles and cups alike
reviews.reviewText: These are great for bottles but also fit soda bottles and other glasses. They have handholds that are large enough for hands that aren’t quite as coordinated so still easy to use. Building confidence for little ones that allow them to become independent. Also easy to hang the bottle with a clip from the handles. It easy to see the level of the bottle with this design which is a big plus! These are a great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The silicone isn't the easiest to remove or clean but they work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hard to use
reviews.reviewText: Hard to install, also blocks the numbers. Even harder to remove, not to say clean.
